snp2.6:274: Dhammacariyaṁ brahmacariyaṁ,Etadāhu vasuttamaṁ;Pabbajitopi ce hoti,Agārā anagāriyaṁ.
snp2.6:275: So ce mukharajātiko,vihesābhirato mago;Jīvitaṁ tassa pāpiyo,rajaṁ vaḍḍheti attano.
snp2.6:276: Kalahābhirato bhikkhu,Mohadhammena āvuto;Akkhātampi na jānāti,Dhammaṁ buddhena desitaṁ.
snp2.6:277: Vihesaṁ bhāvitattānaṁ,avijjāya purakkhato;Saṅkilesaṁ na jānāti,maggaṁ nirayagāminaṁ.
snp2.6:278: Vinipātaṁ samāpanno,gabbhā gabbhaṁ tamā tamaṁ;Sa ve tādisako bhikkhu,pecca dukkhaṁ nigacchati.
snp2.6:279: Gūthakūpo yathā assa,sampuṇṇo gaṇavassiko;Yo ca evarūpo assa,dubbisodho hi sāṅgaṇo.
snp2.6:281: Sabbe samaggā hutvāna,abhinibbajjiyātha naṁ;Kāraṇḍavaṁ niddhamatha,kasambuṁ apakassatha.
snp2.6:283: Suddhā suddhehi saṁvāsaṁ,Kappayavho patissatā;Tato samaggā nipakā,Dukkhassantaṁ karissathāti.
